header.title: My Tech Stack
header.subtitle: The platforms, tools, and methodologies I use to build effective and scalable enterprise solutions.

items.name: Microsoft Power Platform
items.description: The complete suite of low-code tools I use to build end-to-end business solutions, including apps, automations, bots, and analytics, all connected to your data.

items.name: Microsoft Copilot Studio
items.description: Used to build enterprise-grade conversational AI assistants and custom copilots that leverage Generative AI plugins to perform complex actions and streamline user interactions.

items.name: Microsoft AI Builder
items.description: Integrating pre-built AI models directly into Power Apps and Power Automate for tasks like document processing, prediction, and object detection without requiring data science expertise.

items.name: Microsoft Power Automate
items.description: My primary tool for designing and orchestrating complex, end-to-end business process automations (BPA), building robust API integrations, and delivering scalable workflow solutions.

items.name: Microsoft Power Apps
items.description: For creating custom, low-code applications that serve as intuitive, user-friendly interfaces for sophisticated automated workflows and data management.

items.name: Dataverse
items.description: For creating scalable and secure data models that provide a robust foundation for enterprise-grade Power Platform solutions, ensuring data integrity and governance.

items.name: Azure AI Studio
items.description: Developing and managing generative AI solutions, including prompt engineering, model evaluation, and building custom copilots with a unified, pro-code interface.

items.name: Azure AI Search
items.description: Implementing secure, AI-powered search over enterprise data, enabling advanced information retrieval and knowledge mining for generative AI applications.

items.name: Azure AI Translator
items.description: Integrating real-time text translation capabilities into applications and workflows to support multilingual user experiences and global operations.

items.name: Google Cloud Platform
items.description: Leveraging services like Vertex AI to build, deploy, and scale machine learning models, and to access powerful Generative AI capabilities.

items.name: Google Gemini API
items.description: Integrating cutting-edge multimodal and Generative AI capabilities for tasks like content generation, structured data extraction from images, and complex reasoning.

items.name: Microsoft Copilot
items.description: Extending and customizing Microsoft 365 Copilot to create bespoke AI experiences that are deeply integrated into the flow of work within Teams, Outlook, and more.

items.name: React & TypeScript
items.description: The foundation for building modern, performant, and type-safe user interfaces and single-page applications, ensuring a high-quality user experience.

items.name: GitHub
items.description: Essential for robust version control, effective team collaboration, and managing codebases through branching, merging, and pull requests.

items.name: GitHub Copilot
items.description: An AI pair programmer that accelerates development by suggesting code and entire functions in real-time, directly within the code editor.

items.name: AI Assisted Coding
items.description: Utilizing AI-powered tools to accelerate development, improve code quality, and automate repetitive coding tasks, enabling a more efficient and innovative workflow.

items.name: VS Code
items.description: My primary code editor, highly customized with extensions and settings for maximum efficiency in web, Power Platform, and AI development.

items.name: Postman
items.description: An indispensable tool for testing, documenting, and interacting with RESTful APIs, crucial for the integration phase of any automation project.

items.name: Power Fx
items.description: Using the low-code, Excel-like language to build logic and behavior within Power Apps, enabling rapid development of complex functionality.
